summary.title: Internet of Things (IoT) Device
summary.description:
This threat model has been provided by the OWASP Threat Model Cookbook:
threat-model-cookbook/Flow Diagram/iot-device

text.text:
Demo threat model for an IoT Device
provided by the OWASP Threat Model Cookbook:
threat-model-cookbook/Flow Diagram/iot-device

data.name:
Demo threat model for an IoT Device
provided by the OWASP Threat Model Cookbook:
threat-model-cookbook/Flow Diagram/iot-device
HTTPS
data.description: Periodically send a GET request to the API

data.name: Send command
data.description: Periodically GET to the API and receive  a command to execute

threats.title: IoT configuration changed
threats.description: The IoT configuration can be changed by a malicious actor
threats.mitigation: The IoT configuration should be Read Only

threats.title: No AuthN
threats.description: No authentication is needed to access the IoT device from the Python scripts
threats.mitigation: Provide authentication for all scripting requests

threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description: No authentication is needed to access the IoT device from the Mobile App
threats.mitigation: Provide authentication for all requests from the Browser

threats.title: SQL injection
threats.mitigation: Utilization of proper framework ORM (Object-Relational Mapping)
